{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6478AC |revision=V2.0A |series=AC1200 |asin=B018IZ9WZM,B00CEEP3DE |est_release_date=11/25/2015 |fcc_date=12/14/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9564781503 |pcb_id=1244-01000956-50Z |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405D |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3R12E40CBF-8E |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600,8,N,1),, JP2,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=soldered |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=soldered |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=MediaTek |sw_model=MT7530WU |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36;x_4200; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=edimax.setup |default_ssid_regex=^edimax.setup$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=74:DA:38 |oui_eth=74:DA:38 }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Gigabit Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router with USB Port & VPN}} :[http://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/wireless_routers_ac1200/br-6478ac_v2/ Product page]
"1244-01000956-50Z" is silkscreened on the board.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.digitalcitizen.life/reviewing-edimax-br-6478ac-v2-ac1200-gigabit-dual-band-wi-fi-router Reviewed on '''DigitalCitizen''']
===Serial=== *3.3V TTL, (57600,8,N,1) :JP2, 4-pin: VDD; RX; GND; TX;
===See also=== *[[Edimax BR-6478AC]] (V1.0A) FCC ID: [http://fccid.io/NDD9564781213 NDD9564781213] *[[Edimax BR-6485AC]] (V1.0A) FCC ID: [http://fccid.io/NDD9564851502 NDD9564851502] *[[Edimax BR-6208AC]] (V1.0A) FCC ID: [http://fccid.io/NDD9562081312 NDD9562081312] *[[Edimax BR-6208AC v2]] (V2.0A) FCC ID: [http://fccid.io/NDD6208AC NDD6208AC] :[[MediaTek]] MT7620A / MT7610E, 1x WAN, 3x LAN
